Html:
Is the value being attributed to this bonus correct?

 

I'm currently trying to decide on next badge purchases and RAWR seems to value this 4 piece bonus at around 600 greater than the 2 piece T9 bonus.  I'm not saying this is incorrect but it feels a little over valued.

 

My armory here:  http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Quel%27Thalas&cn=Vahana&gn=Aurora

 

Thoughts?

The 4-piece is really good compared to the 2-piece. The 2-piece basically gives 3-6 extra shreds over the course of the fight (depending on how long the fight lasts).

The 4-piece allows your rake, which you should have up 90-95% of the time, to crit. This values increases more, the more crit you have. The more crit you have, the more chances your rake will crit. Because rake falls under special attacks, it's not affected by the white crit cap (79.8% crit).
4T10 is simply really good. If you're a cat, and you're not spending absolutely every badge you get on tier gear until you get 4T10, you're doing it wrong.
Cool - was just checking.  And was too lazy to double check the math :)  Many thanks for quick response.
